actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to eliminate the practice of providing part-year funding of full-year programs and the use of continuing resolutions in lieu of general appropriation measures.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the consideration of bills or joint resolutions: (1) containing part-year funding for certain programs; or (2) making continuing appropriations.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to eliminate the practice of providing part-year funding of full-year programs and the use of continuing resolutions in lieu of general appropriation measures.
